string.text: artifacts,trading,friendly
Hey %other_first_name%, you still looking for that Soul artifact?
Damn right I am! You actually found one?
Maybe. Depends on what you're offering. This thing wasn't easy to get.
How about 25k rubles and that Vintar BC you wanted?
Alright Ill take it! Meet me at %location%, same spot as last time.
mutants,danger,urgent
%other_last_name%! Don't go to the old warehouse! Bloodsucker nest!
Shit! How many did you see, %other_first_name%?
At least three. Maybe more. Lost Ivan and Petrov already.
Thanks for the warning, brother. I'll try to spread the word.
faction,tension,rivalry
You %other_faction% mice were sniffing around our territory again.
Your territory? no one gives a fuck what you say. You guys are a joke
You are not going to like our punchline
COME ON THEN! We are ready.
You %other_faction% vermin better watch out.
All talk as usual.
faction,tension,rivalry
You %other_faction% lot were bleeding into our sector again.
How about you shut the fuck up, you can't enforce shit.
You'll be the first, %speaker1_last_name%
faction,tension,rivalry
YO %other_faction% mouth-breathers, we've disabled all your traps by %location%. Fucking idiots
How can you possibly know you got them all or even a fraction of them.
Alright listen I'm not gonna have a logical debate with you about the philosophies of trap disarment and survivorship bias.
Hope your gear’s as good as your words.
faction,tension,rivalry
We saw you %other_faction% boys skulking %location%. Looking for another beating?
We go where we want. You don’t own shit but a pile of corpses.
Say that again when you're not hiding behind anomaly fog.
You're welcome to step into the fog, we’ll light it up for you.
More empty threats by %other_faction% punks.
faction,tension,rivalry
God damn it! %other_faction% scum were looting our dead again.
Your dead aren't using the gear. Consider recycling and changing channels idiot
artifacts,trading,friendly
%other_first_name%, heard you got your hands on a Moonlight artifact.
Maybe I do. Depends on the going price for one.
15k rubles and this modified VSS. Fair trade?
Ehh, make it 20k and you got a deal. This thing wasn't easy to get.
Alright, 20k it is. Meet me %location% in an hourish.
friendly,warning,story
%other_last_name%! Unknown convoy heading your way, about half a dozen strong!
Shit! How far out are they, %speaker1_first_name%?
Maybe 15 minutes. They seemed armed heavy, hurry the fuck up.
Thanks for the heads up. I'm bugging out now!
equipment,help,friendly
%other_first_name% brat, my rifle's jamming every few shots. You know anything about gunsmithing?
Let me guess - AK-74? Those things clog up fast in this radioactive mud.
Nahh you're bullshitting. AK's are built for the mud, are you crazy?
Brat, no offense but you don't know what you're talking about.
You know what, not gonna argue with you brat! I'm heading back to our hideout, I'll leave the AK on ur bench
faction,tension,rivalry
You %other_faction% bastards think you own this whole area!
We earned our territory. Unlike you %speaker1_faction% cowards.
Only thing you've earned is my balls on your chin, sit down.
xD A'ight thats pretty funny, you're still a bitch tho.
mutants,hunting,cooperation
%other_first_name%, want to team up for that Chimera bounty?
Yes! That thing nearly got us by surprise couple days ago. What's the plan?
I'll bait it into an open area, you hit it with the auto shotty from the bushes. I'll cover you with the SVD
Risky, but it might work. Split the bounty 40-60 since I'm taking the bigger risk.
Fair enough. Let's gear up and move out.
emergency,rescue,urgent
MAYDAY! %other_first_name%, I'm pinned down by snorks %location%!
Hold tight %speaker1_last_name%! How many are there?
At least five, maybe more! Running low on ammo!
I'm 5 minutes out with grenades. Try to fall back to cover!
information,trading,friendly
%other_first_name%, I got intel on a fresh artifact spawn. Interested?
Depends on the price and location. What kind of artifact?
Flash artifact, high-grade. 5k for the coordinates.
That's steep. How about 3k and I'll owe you a favor?
Deal. Swap to private channel.
supplies,problems,friendly
%other_first_name%, shit's getting tight. Running low on everything.
How bad we talking?
Bad. Maybe a week's worth if we're lucky. Need to find more soon.
Know anyone selling? My usual guy vanished.
Not really, you said you'd handle it.
anomaly,danger,warning
%other_first_name%, stay away from the old factory. New anomaly field appeared overnight.
What kind of anomaly? Gravitational? Electrical?
Something I've never seen before. Turns metal to glass, organic matter to stone.
Fuck... thanks for the warning. I was planning to scavenge there today.
Yeah, definitely avoid it. Lost a good detector testing the edge of that field.
stash,discovery,greed
%other_first_name%, someone stole half of my stash. Did you hear anything about it?
Damn, nah haven't heard anything brat.
Someone does. If I catch them...
Might be those rookies that came through yesterday.
Rookies, huh? I'll find those fuckers.
Let me know if you need help.
faction,tension,rivalry
Listen up %other_faction% people. We're proposing a ceasefire near %location%.
A ceasefire? Since when do %speaker1_faction% care about peace?
Since we're all losing good men to the recent large mutant migration in the area.
...I'll run it by command. No promises.
medical,emergency,urgent
%other_first_name%! Need a medic ASAP! Glukovsky's bleeding bad!
What happened? Where are you?
Boar attack near %location%. Tore through his armor like paper!
Apply pressure to the wound! I'm sending a squad your way!
Hurry the fuck up! I can't stop this fucking bleed.
advice,emission,experienced
Sky went red near Rostok. Barely made it to cover.
Yeah that red glow means drop everything and hide.
Any spots around there when you're caught out?
Old checkpoint north of the scrapyard. Still got a roof.
Thanks. Owe you one.
faction,betrayal,anger
You %other_faction% snakes broke the truce at %location%!
Wasn't us.
Bullshit! They had %other_faction% patches!
Could be renegades wearing our colors. Think about it!
I'll get to the fucking end of this, dont worry.
I'm not worried.
mutants,controller,horror
Brat... something's wrong... hearing voices...
Shit! Controller nearby! Look at your feet, don't look up!
Can't... resist... it's calling me...
SNAP OUT OF IT BRAT!
trading,illegal,suspicious
%other_first_name%, I can get you that experimental rifle you wanted.
The Gauss rifle? I thought those were military only.
Let's just say I know a guy who knows a guy with a stash. 150k rubles.
That's... actually reasonable. Send me the info?
Done, check your private channel.
mystery,zone,investigation
%other_first_name%, you heard about the stalkers disappearing near the Brain Scorcher?
Yeah, but people always disappear there. What's different?
Their bodies show up days later, miles away, perfectly preserved.
That's... not normal, even for the Zone.
All these years and we're still clueless to the inner workings of the zone.
humor,drunk,friendly
%other_first_name%! My bset friend! Hve I told you...youre my fucking brat!?
Cyka, how much vodka did you drink?
Not enouhg! The Zone... shes singing to me! Come! JOIN
Alright buddy, time to sleep it off before you wander into an anomaly.
faction,territory,negotiation
This is %speaker1_faction% territory now. Pack your shit and leave.
Now I know you're not talking to us.
Watch us. You have 24 hours.
Nah. Good luck!
Gather the men Sergei
mutants,bloodsucker,crazy_job
%other_first_name%, some crazy eggheads want a live bloodsucker.
A LIVE one? They lost their minds?
They're paying 120k for it. Still sound crazy?
...Shit. How the hell would we even do that?
I got some ideas. You in or out?
Send over the details.
missing,group,urgent
That group that went to Red Forest hasn't come back.
How long they been gone?
Too long. Six hours past when they said.
Fuck. We checking on them or what?
Yeah. Get your gear.
supplies,food,problem
%other_first_name%, our stash is looking very lacking.
Cyka. How did the hunting go?
No fucking luck.
We'll plan out a loot run for tomorrow when I get back, almost done with the deal.
artifacts,danger,warning
DON'T TOUCH THAT ARTIFACT! %other_first_name%, step back NOW!
What? Why? It's just glowing a bit...
BLYAT BACK AWAY!
Backing away slowly...
You don't want to know what i saw through the scope. Regroup.
story,campfire,horror
Anyone else hear about that stalker who got stuck in a time loop near Yantar?
Bullshit story. Time doesn't work like that, even in the Zone.
No man, I met him. Guy aged 10 years in what felt like a day to us. Eyes were all fucked up, kept muttering about "the loop closing"
...shit. Maybe I'll avoid Yantar for a while.
warning,danger,advice
See those grass circles? Stay the fuck away from them.
Why? Just grass, right?
Nah. Zone does weird shit there. People go missing.
Missing how?
Pieces show up later. Different places. Just avoid them.
story,survival,close_call
Holy fuck boys, I just had the closest call of my life.
What happened %speaker1_first_name%? You sound shook.
Pseudogiant chased me into a whirligig field. Had to dodge between the anomalies while that thing charged through them.
No fucking way you survived that.
The whirligigs tore it apart. I'm covered in mutant chunks but alive. Need vodka. Lots of vodka.
artifacts,danger,story
Remember that Kolobok I was tracking? Found it.
Nice! That's worth at least 40k!
Yeah, about that... it was bait. Fucking bandits had set up the whole thing.
Shit, they get you?
Nah, but i had to leave my detector and most of my ammo behind...fuck, living off tourist's delight for a week now.
mystery,zone,phenomenon
Guys, I just saw something that shouldn't exist.
In the Zone? That's basically Tuesday bro.
No, I mean it. A fucking door. Just standing in the middle of a field, no walls, nothing. And it was open.
Did you... look through it?
I saw myself on the other side. But older. Much older. He waved at me to stay away.
Cyka... Where was this?
Not saying. Some things should stay lost.
humor,rookie,mistake
HAHAHA just saw the funniest shit %location%.
Spill it! I need a laugh.
Rookie tried to throw a bolt at an anomaly but threw his whole fucking detector instead??
NO WAY! What did he do next?
Detector got fried, and now he's throwing actual roubles to check for anomalies. HAHAHAH
Not gonna help him?
Ehh he made his choices.
horror,underground,story
Don't go into Pripyat. Just... don't.
Why? What happened %other_first_name%?
I don't want to talk about it.
Vodka on me brat, meet me at %location%.
I'll take you up on that.
humor,fight,bar
%other_first_name% you missed the best bar fight ever last night!
Ah fuck, what happened?
Some asshole said beer was better than vodka. Whole place erupted!
xD Who won?
The barkeep. Shot his shotty into the ceiling. Everyone bought him drinks after that!
mutants,danger,warning
Bloodsuckers are pulling new shit now.
What kind of shit?
One shows itself, others jump you from behind. Lost two guys to this.
Fuck. Smart bastards.
Yeah. Watch your back when you see one. Probably more hiding.
trading,gossip,economy
Sidorovich is ripping people off worse than usual
When isn't that fat fuck scamming stalkers?
No I mean REALLY bad. 1K rubles for fucking bread blyat
Highway robbery! What's his excuse this time?
"Supply chain issues" he says. More like greed chain issues.
ghost,story,supernatural
I saw him again. The stalker with no face.
Not this shit again %speaker1_first_name%. You need to lay off the vodka
I'm serious! He was at the old checkpoint, just standing there. Where his face should be was just... smooth.
Maybe it was a guy in a mask?
He walked through the fucking wall when I approached. THROUGH it.
equipment,failure,frustration
FUCK FUCK FUCK my suit just failed in the worst possible moment!
What happened? You okay?
Servo in the leg locked up mid-sprint from a pack of dogs. Faceplanted hard.
Shit, did they get you?
Nah, managed to unlock it and hobble to safety. But I need a new suit ASAP.
stash,mystery,creepy
Found the weirdest stash today. Just... photos. Hundreds of photos.
Photos of what?
Sleeping stalkers. All different ones. Some I recognize, some are probably dead now.
That's fucking creepy. Burn that shit.
Already did. But now I can't sleep without checking my surroundings every few minutes.
faction,politics,argument
Your %other_faction% leadership is a fucking joke.
Rich coming from %speaker1_faction% dogs who can't even hold their own territory.
At least we don't kiss military ass for table scraps.
Keep talking shit and see what happens.
Is that a threat? Because I'm ready whenever you are.
%location%, tomorrow at dawn. Come alone.
emission,survival,story
Almost didn't make it through that last emission
Where were you when it hit?
Middle of fucking nowhere. Had to hide under a rusted car chassis
Cyka! that's not proper shelter!
Tell me about it. My hair's falling out and I can taste metal. But I'm alive.
scavenging,loot,friendly
%other_first_name%, you won't believe what I found in that old lab
Scientific samples? Documents?
Better. Unopened pre-war chocolate. Like 20 bars!
No way! That stuff's worth its weight in artifacts!
Already sold half to some mercs. Keeping the rest for special occasions.
paranormal,mystery,fear
During my last trip to Red Forest i saw trees bleeding.
What do you mean bleeding?
Red liquid seeping from the bark. Smells like iron. The ground underneath was all black.
That's... that's not possible
I don't know anymore what's possible or not.
controller,danger,warning
How do you know a controller's near?
Nose bleeds. Then your head hurts like hell.
Shit...
And don't look at it straight on. Use corners of your eyes.
Good to know. Thanks.
dreams,zone,psychological
Anyone else having the dreams?
What dreams?
The ones where the Zone is calling you deeper. Showing you things.
Shit... What kind of things? I've...been having similar dreams.
A golden rusty door... And a voice saying "come home"
What the fuck...This can't be coincidence. Something's happening.
What do you mean?
Rusty golden door?! Were you able to open it?? I couldn't.
The harder i tried to open it the quieter the voice` got.
Maybe it's time to think of an exit plan off the zone. It has to be a sign.
combat,survival,intense
Held off 20 monolith at the bridge yesterday. Down to my last mag.
Bullshit. 20 monolith and you're still breathing?
Had high ground and they had to funnel through. Plus one of them dropped a RPG.
Holy shit. How many did you take down?
Lost count after 12. Bridge is littered with bodies. Good salvage if anyone's brave enough.
humor,dark,friendly
What's the difference between a rookie and an anomaly?
Oh god, another one of your shit jokes?
The anomaly might actually kill you quickly! HAHAHA
That's terrible. Tell me another one.
Why don't bloodsuckers attack those %other_faction% punks? Professional courtesy!??
mystery,stalker,legend
The Ghost of Pripyat saved my ass today
That's just a legend man
Tell that to the sniper who had me dead to rights. One second I'm about to die, next second the sniper's down
Could've been anyone
Nobody else around for miles. And I found a chess piece where the shot came from. A white king.
mutant,humor,unusual
So I maybe sort of have a pet pseudodog now
WHAT THE FUCK %speaker1_first_name%
It was injured! I fed it some sausage and now it follows me around
That thing will eat your face the moment you run out of food
Nah he's chill. Already warned me about two ambushes. I call him Sausage.
technology,malfunction,zone
All electronics %location% just died simultaneously
EMP anomaly?
No, weirder. They're working again but everything's displaying backwards. Text, numbers, everything.
The Zone's getting more aggressive with its mindfucks
Had to use a mirror to read my PDA. This place gets stranger every day.
humor,hazing,rookies
We sent the new guy to find a "left-handed screwdriver" HAHAHAH
Classic! How long's he been looking?
2 hours! He's been to every trader in the area!
Wait till he figures it out. I remember when we did to you!
Fuck you, I was young and stupid! hahaha
zone,thoughts,casual
This place fucks with your head sometimes.
No shit. What now?
Feel like it knows when you're coming. Changes things around.
You been drinking that Freedom weed vodka again?
Maybe. But tell me I'm wrong.
...Can't. Place is fucked.
supplies,ambush,combat
Supply run was a fucking trap. Lost half the shipment.
Bandits?
Worse. Mercs with insider info. Someone sold us out.
Any idea who?
Got my suspicions. When I find out, they're gonna wish the Zone took them instead.
artifacts,discovery,excitement
Found something weird with artifacts!
Yeah? What?
Put two different ones together during emission... they changed.
Changed how? You mean broke?
No, turned into something new. Worth way more too.
Bullshit... but if true, that's huge money.
memories,veteran,nostalgia
Been in the Zone for 15 years now. Sometimes I forget what the outside looks like.
Why don't you leave then, old timer?
Leave? This place is in my blood now. Tried once. Lasted two weeks.
What brought you back?
The silence outside. No anomalies humming, no Geiger clicking. Felt... wrong. Dead.
The Zone ruins us all in the end, doesn't it?
emergency,warning,urgent
EVERYONE STAY AWAY FROM %location%. Something bad there.
What kind of bad? Mutants? Scouts?
Don't know. Group of people moving weird. Heavily armed.
How many?
Counted six. I've left.
Copy that. Thanks for the warning.
drunk,philosophy,humor
bros.... what if.. what if anomalies are just the zone's farts?
How fucking drunk are you right now?
no no hear me out... gravitational anomaly = burp... flame = spicy fart...
I'm cutting you off. No more vodka.
WHIRLIGIG IS WHEN THE ZONE SPINS AFTER DRINKING TOO MUCH
hunting,bloodsucker,professional
Taking contracts for bloodsucker removal. 20k per head.
That's steep. Why so much?
Because I actually deliver. 47 confirmed kills. I know their patterns.
Prove it.
Check my PDA profile. Every kill documented. I don't fuck around.
romance,relationship,personal
She said yes!
Who said yes to what?
That trader's daughter in Skadovsk. Asked her to leave the Zone with me!
You're leaving? After all these years?
Time to try normal life. If I survive the next month saving up.
sleep,zone,serious
Anyone else barely sleep out here? Feels like the Zone hums at night.
Yeah. It's like something's always watching. Even when it’s dead quiet.
I hear footsteps sometimes. No one there when I check.
Maybe the Zone doesn’t sleep. And it doesn’t like it when you do either.
* passes blunt *
haha yeah, that probably would help you sleep brat!
monolith,defector,serious
Ex-Monolith here. The voices stopped. I need help.
How do we know you're not still brainwashed?
Because I remember my name... i think. My real name! And what I did... God, what I did...
What did you do? Talk.
I don't even know where to...We rounded up stalkers... for "cleansing." The Monolith made us do things to them while still alive. Their screams... fed the device. Amplified the Zone’s whispers.
Bullshit. But continue...
Living batteries. The Scorcher fries minds, but bodies... they twitch for days. We wired them into the machine. The agony... it powers the Monolith’s signal. Turns pain into control.
Christ... And the voices? How’d you break free?
I...don't remember...I did something but i don't remember what, my mind's foggy
No one can help you, all you can do is create a new identity like you have. Start fresh...Welcome Back STALKER
scam,warning,trading
WARNING: %other_first_name%, Petrovsky is selling fake artifacts!
That bastard! He got me last week!
Same. "Moonlight" turned out to be a painted rock
Someone should teach him a lesson
Already on it. Swap to private channel.
weather,anomaly,strange
It was raining upwards last time i was in Red Forest. UPWARDS.
What the fuck do you mean upwards?
Water falling from clouds and then levitating while ground water went upwards into the mass. Puddles in the sky.
Zone physics.
It truly was a sight though.
family,personal,emotional
Just got a message. I'm a father. Baby girl.
Holy shit! Congratulations brother!
Thanks. Need to make one more big score and get out. She deserves a real father.
What's her name?
Svetlana. After her grandmother. I'm coming home, little light.
conspiracy,theory,paranoid
I've connected the dots. The Zone isn't expanding randomly.
Here we go again with your theories...
Listen! It's following ley lines! Ancient energy paths!
You've been hitting the freedom weed again haven't you
Mock me all you want. When the Zone reaches Moscow following the dragon line, remember I called it!
Just put the ammo in the bag brat.
job,money,dangerous
Got a job if you want big money.
How big?
300k for two weeks.
That's suicide money. What's the job?
CNPP. Need to grab something.
...Fuck no. Ask the next guy.
rookie,panic,help
HELP!! TRAPPED IN BUILDING!! THINGS OUTSIDE!! HELP!!
Calm down rookie. Where are you? What things?
I DONT KNOW!! INVISIBLE BUT I HEAR BREATHING!! CLAWS ON WALLS!!
Bloodsuckers. Stay quiet. Do NOT run. Where exactly are you?
I got lost running somewhere near %location%!! Please hurry! Down to last mag!!
discovery,anomalies,news
Heard the eggheads figured something out about anomalies.
Yeah? What now?
They make sounds we can't hear. But with right gear, you can find them easier.
So no more throwing bolts?
Maybe. If it works, changes everything.
I'll believe it when I see it.
mystery,abandoned,creepy
Found a town that's not on any map. Completely intact but empty.
Empty how? Bodies? Signs of struggle?
Nothing. Food still on tables. Cars with keys in ignition. Like everyone vanished instantly.
Get out of there. Now.
Why? Found good loot and... wait. The church bell is ringing but no one's there to ring it...
RUN YOU IDIOT!
trading,drama,conflict
That new trader %location% is a total dick
What'd he do?
Sold me "armor-piercing" rounds. They're fucking blanks painted black!
LMAO you fell for the oldest trick in the book
job,danger,money
Need someone to test new gear. Paying good.
Last time someone "tested" shit, people died.
Just need to wear this suit near anomaly. That's it.
How much?
100k for 10 minutes.
If you're paying that much, suit's probably gonna kill me.
story,campfire,legend
My grandfather told me the Zone existed before Chernobyl.
Bullshit. Everyone knows it started with the disaster.
No, he said there were always strange spots. Places where physics broke. Chernobyl just made it visible.
Your grandpa was a drunk potato farmer!
Shut the fuck up.
equipment,review,advice
PSA: That new "Eclipse" suit is garbage. Don't waste your money.
What's wrong with it? Specs looked good
Tears like paper. Psy-protection is nonexistent. Weight distribution is fucked.
Damn, already got a mechanic to custom fit one
Cancel it. Get a used SEVA instead. Uglier but won't get you killed.
mutants,sighting,strange
Saw some weird shit today. Glowing deer.
Glowing? Like radioactive?
No, actually glowing blue. Didn't attack or nothing.
Zone keeps making new things.
Yeah. Sometimes it's not all trying to kill us.
feud,conflict,personal
If I see %other_first_name% again, he's dead. DEAD.
Whoa you're alive?? what did i do?
YOU LEFT ME FOR DEAD. Took my artifacts and ran when the bloodsuckers came.
I called for you and you didn't answer! I legged it like any reasoning person would.
Where are you??
Uhhh not gonna tell you that
The zone is a small place to hide.
routine,daily,casual
nothing like Zone coffee to start the day. tastes like motor oil but keeps you sharp
You guys have coffee? Living luxury over there
"coffee" - it's burnt grain and chicory root. maybe some actual coffee from 2008
Still better than energy drinks. Those make your piss glow
everything makes your piss glow here, friend. that's how you know you're alive
mutants,tactics,warning
UPDATE: Snorks are hunting in coordinated packs now. Just saw 8 moving in formation.
Formation? Those things can barely think
Tell that to the enemy patrol they ambushed. Flanking maneuvers and everything.
This is bad. Really bad.
Zone's teaching them. Or something is. Either way, watch your six.
artifacts,warning,experience
Don't wear Soul artifacts too long. Trust me.
Why? What happens?
Your body gets used to it. Can't heal without it anymore.
Shit, been wearing mine for weeks...
Take it off slow. Going cold makes you feel like dying.
horror,night,psychological
Anyone else having the dreams? The ones with the door?
Black door? Red handle? Yeah.
Fuck. It's spreading. In mine, something's knocking from the other side.
Don't open it. Whatever you do, don't open it in the dream.
Why? What happens?
Kozlov opened it. He hasn't slept in six days. Says "they" are waiting for him to close his eyes.
lucky,find,treasure
JACKPOT! Found an untouched military cache!
Bullshit. All the good stuff's been picked clean
Hidden under a collapsed tunnel. 200 rounds of AP, NVGs, and THREE exoskeletons!
Holy shit! Need help moving it?
Already moved. But I'll sell you an exo for 80k. Friends discount.
mutants,changes,warning
Mutants are changing. Getting harder to kill.
What do you mean?
Bloodsuckers with thicker skin. Boars that look armored. Weird shit.
Great. As if they weren't hard enough.
Yeah. And it's happening fast. Real fast.
trading,review,recommendation
New trader %location% is legit. Fair prices, quality gear.
What's the catch? There's always a catch.
No catch. Ex-military quartermaster. Knows his shit and doesn't gouge.
Does he have medical supplies?
Full stock. Even has those military stimpaks. Expensive but worth it.
weather,warning,danger
Bad psi-storm going towards Red Forest. Stay away.
How bad?
Really bad. Will fuck your brain even with protection.
Shit, my buddies are heading there!
Tell them to turn around. Now.
legend,mystery,story
They say if you see your own grave in the Zone, you have 3 days to leave or it comes true
Superstitious bullshit
Markov saw his. Laughed it off. Found him three days later exactly where the grave showed.
Coincidence.
Maybe. But if you see a headstone with your name, maybe don't test it?
tech,help,equipment
Anyone know how to fix a fried PDA mainboard?
Fried how? EMP? Water? Vodka?
Electro anomaly. Screen works but no GPS or comms.
Try replacing the RF module. Usually first thing to blow.
Where the hell do I find RF modules in the Zone?
Old radio station has boxes of them. Or cannibalize a dead stalker's PDA.
final,goodbye,emotional
This is it boys. Making my run for the Wish Granter.
For real? Don't actually do it man. It's not worth it.
Been here 8 years. Lost everything outside. This is all I have left.
Fuck...What will you wish for?
To forget. To forget all of this. To forget her. See you on the other side, stalkers.
Don't do it %other_first_name%.
I...have to. I can't anymore. About to lose connection. Good bye Stalkers.
Crazy fucker...
equipment,maintenance,coordination
%other_first_name%, you got a minute? Need help with this rifle scope.
Sure thing. What's the problem?
Keeps drifting to the left. Already tried adjusting the windage.
Could be the mount. Check if the screws are tight on the rail.
Good call... yep, found two loose ones. How'd you know?
Same thing happened to me last month. Almost missed a perfect shot.
Thanks man, mind if I come over, got some other gear needs looking over?
Yeah sure, meet me at the bar later on.
supplies,planning,casual
%other_last_name%, we need more supplies soon.
What we need most?
Ammo's almost gone. Medical shit too.
I know a guy with medical stuff. Trades cheap.
What about ammo? Need 5.45 bad.
I'll ask around. Someone's always selling.
Need food too. Anything that lasts.
How much money we got?
About 50k. Maybe 60k if we're smart.
Alright. I'll see what I can find.
scouting,report,casual
Checked out sector 7. All clear.
See anything interesting?
Flesh tracks by the pipes. Fresh ones.
How many you think?
Maybe four or five. Heading north.
That's toward the old depot.
Yeah. Not coming our way though.
Where you at now?
Coming back. Be there in few hours.
Watch yourself out there.
mystery,disappearance,rumors
%other_first_name%, you hear about that group that vanished by the silo?
Yeah. Just gone. No bodies, nothing.
Guy who went there said he heard voices. Weird ones.
That place always been fucked. Compass spins, dogs won't go near.
Maybe it's some new anomaly shit.
Whatever it is, I'm staying away.
Zone keeps making new ways to kill us.
Some old guys say Zone's getting worse.
Wouldn't surprise me. Place gets weirder every year.
Yeah. Best to avoid that silo completely.
trading,equipment,friendly
%other_first_name%, still looking for that upgraded detector?
Hell yes! You found one?
Managed to get my hands on a Bear detector. Slightly used but fully functional.
Nice! What are you looking for in exchange?
Still need that night vision scope you mentioned last week.
The PSO-1? Yeah, I can part with it for another 5k on top. Fair trade?
More than fair. When do you want to make the swap?
How about tomorrow evening? I'll be back from patrol around 1800 hours.
Perfect. I'll have the scope cleaned and ready. Thanks for thinking of me.
No problem, we look out for each other. See you tomorrow, brat.
scavenging,planning,stalker_team
Yo %other_last_name%, you still up for hitting that old factory tomorrow?
Yeah, I'm in. What's the plan, and who's tagging along?
Me, you, Petrov, and that new kid who just came from the Garbage. Quiet crew.
The rookie? Hope he doesn't freeze up if things get weird.
He’ll be fine. It’s just a parts run. Some busted terminals and maybe a few old batteries.
Alright. Long as we don’t run into anything with more teeth than sense.
Few blind dogs, maybe a spark or two. Nothing major. We'll steer clear of the deeper wing.
You thinking early morning, or wait 'til the fog burns off?
Let’s move after breakfast. Should be back at the camp before dusk if all goes smooth.
Cool. I’ll sort my pack tonight, make sure the rookie ain’t bringing junk gear.
personal,friendly,wellbeing
%other_first_name%, you doing alright? Haven't seen you around much lately.
Yeah, just been pulling extra jobs. Trying to save up some rubles.
Saving for anything specific or just building reserves?
Thinking about upgrading my armor. This old jacket's seen better days.
Good call. What are you looking at? SEVA suit?
Haha not quite there yet! Something more affordable.
resources,management,practical
%other_last_name%, we need to discuss fuel allocation for the generators.
How much do we have left? Last I checked we were running pretty low.
About three days worth at current consumption rate. Maybe four if we conserve.
Shit. Any ideas on where to get more? Our usual supplier's been unreliable.
There's an abandoned gas station about 4 clicks east. Might still have some reserves.
Worth checking out, we'll head there tomorrow.
equipment,review,advice
%other_first_name%, tried that new rifle you recommended. Impressive accuracy.
Told you so! The L85 might look weird but it shoots straight.
Only complaint is the weight. Thing's heavy as hell compared to my AK.
Yeah, that's the trade-off. Better accuracy but more weight to carry around.
Worth it though. Nailed three dogs at 200 meters without breaking a sweat.
Nice shooting! How's the ammo situation? 5.56 can be pricey.
Yeah, about twice what I pay for 5.45. But quality over quantity, right?
Exactly. Better to have fewer rounds that count than spray and pray.
Any other gear recommendations? Always looking to upgrade.
Check out the new tactical vests from that trader. Good protection, reasonable price.
dreams,zone,strange
%other_last_name%, you ever have those weird-ass dreams out here?
Every other night. Last one, I was walking through Rostok, but everything was upside down.
Huh. I had one where the sky was bleeding and dogs spoke in human voices. Woke up sweating.
The Zone gets in your head, man. Too many emissions, too many nights under the open sky.
Think it's just stress? Or is it something else... like it's showing us things?
I don’t know. But I’ve heard guys say they dream about places they’ve never seen—then find them later.
That happen to you?
Once. Had a dream about a flooded tunnel with glowing moss. Found it last week west of Agroprom. But who the fuck knows, could be just Deja vu.
That’s messed up. Maybe the Zone’s not just mutating us—it’s rewiring us too.
Heh. Wouldn’t be the weirdest thing it’s done. Just wish the dreams didn’t feel so damn real.
rumor,stranger,zone
Did you see that guy that came through camp last week? Long coat, didn’t say a word?
Yeah. Looked like he walked straight out of a storm. Gear was soaked, eyes hollow.
Someone said he was seen coming from near the Brain Scorcher. Alone!.
No way he made it out of there solo. That whole sector fries your head if you get too close.
That's what I thought. But he had no burns, no rads. Like the Zone just let him pass.
He didn’t even trade. Just sat by the fire, stared into it like it was showing him something.
Did you notice the dogs wouldn’t go near him?
I did. Even Vaska's mutt, and that thing barks at anomalies.
Zone's full of ghosts, man. Maybe this one just learned how to walk among the living.
missing,stalker,pragmatic
Misha still not back? Been two days.
Nope. Last signal was by the burnt farm.
That area's bad news lately.
Yeah, bloodsucker tracks everywhere.
He knew the risks going alone.
Still. Might check where signal died.
You thinking of looking?
Maybe. At least see what happened.
I'll go with. But if we just find gear...
Then we know. And we take the gear.
weapon,malfunction,combat
You ever have your rifle jam right when things go bad?
Yesterday. Wild dogs rushed me near the embankment — damn bolt got stuck halfway.
What’d you do?
Switched to the pistol. Emptied the whole mag just to get breathing room.
I keep telling you — stop using that rusted-out AK from the flea market. It’s held together with tape and prayers.
Hey, it was cheap. And it *usually* works.
“Usually” doesn’t cut it out here. Get yourself a backup that doesn’t jam when you sneeze.
Yeah, yeah. Soon as I sell this artifact I’ve been hauling around.
Just don’t die holding junk. Ain’t worth the rubles.
stash,greed,missing
You hear what happened to Lobanov?
Yeah. Word is he found a military stash north of the swamp checkpoint. Then vanished.
Typical. Gets lucky once and suddenly he’s too good to share it with the rest of us.
Or someone followed him. Could’ve been bandits — stash like that doesn’t stay quiet long.
He should’ve kept his mouth shut. Was bragging about it over vodka like a rookie.
Now his radio's dead and no one's seen him for two days. Either he bailed... or he’s dead in a ditch.
Another zone mystery.
trading,black_market,negotiation
Heard you got your hands on some ex-military ammo. True?
Depends who’s asking—and what you’re offering.
Name your price. I’ve got two cases of vodka and a couple of geiger counters.
Vodka alone won’t cut it. How about one case and your old SEVA suit?
My SEVA’s barely holding together—you’re flirting with death here.
Then consider it a lifetime warranty. I stand by my goods.
Fine. Meet me at the last spot, text me when.
weapons,maintenance,reliability
My rifle jammed mid-fight yesterday. Thought that was the end of me.
Bet you’re still using that filthy AK, huh?
Does the job when it wants to. I clean it, but it keeps misfiring.
Oil it less. Too much gunk turns it into a dust magnet.
Easy for you to say. You’ve got that Western piece from the convoy raid.
Yeah, and I strip it every night like a ritual. Only thing I trust out here is my gun.
Guess I’ll have to trade up soon.
traps,fieldcraft,improvisation
You ever spot those tripwires out by the railway tunnel?
Yeah. They've rigged them to nailboxes and pressure flares. Nasty work.
I’ve been carrying wire cutters and a tent peg. Works for most disarms.
Until you hit one wired to a deadman switch. Then it’s all reflex.
Started using mirrors to check angles before stepping in. Saved me twice now.
Smart. Next haul, I’m picking up a fiber scope. This DIY crap’s gonna get me killed.
friendship,reunion,nostalgia
%other_first_name%? You around, heard you came back?
And last I heard you were headed West for good!
Got restless. Nothing outside felt alive like here.
Crazy how we risked everything chasing ghosts and stayed for more.
mutants,ambush,combat,intense
They came at us from below the ground, giant mole rats! At least couple dozen of them.
Cyka. We barely handled the blind dogs yesterday.
Yeah, but the moles dig. No line of sight, just sudden gouges and screeches.
How’d you even fight back?
Grenade. Blew half the tunnel, lost two good men...
Cyka...I'm sorry brat.
smuggling,negotiation,danger
%other_first_name%, got that shipment of military rations through customs?
Barely. Fed half to the guards as “toll.”
Fuck. And the rest?
Stashed it. You know the drill.
Good. Meet me there at midnight. And bring firepower.
humor,poison,warning
Hey %other_first_name%, tried that homemade vodka you gave me.
How was it?
Not bad at all, maybe a bit too strong.
Hm, I'll keep tweaking it.
scavenging,ethics,morality
%other_first_name%, got a minute to talk shop?
If this is another spiel about "zone's counsciousness" go bs somewhere else.
Nah I'm talking about looting. I mean taking gear off someone still warm. Feels different.
Cold’s colder. You want to die over feelings or survive off someone else’s shit?
It’s not guilt...it’s the idea that one day, someone’ll be stripping me too.
That’s the deal out here. Leave nothing behind, take what you can.
Still feels like we’re eating each other one pocket at a time.
food,contamination,survival
Found an old army crate back near the checkpoint. Still had rations inside.
What kind? The dry bricks or the canned sludge?
Mixed bag. Labels were faded, but I opened one and it reeked like diesel.
Zone rot. Probably absorbed radiation or chemicals. You eat it?
Half a tin. Got dizzy and threw up for an hour. Not recommended.
You’re an idiot.
suspicion,encounter,preparation
Hey %other_first_name%... It might just be me daydreaming but when we were on our way back here, I saw some shady guys wandering around. You wanna go back and take a look?
I thought you'd never ask, those guys were creeping me the fuck out too. I mean, who creeps around in broad daylight like that? Something definitely seemed off. You loaded?
I'm a little short on ammo but I think I'll make it. What about you?
My gun's still in rough shape from our last encounter with that damned Chimera but a mechanic should be nearby here, somewhere. Let's pay him a visit and then head out.
Sounds good, let's go. Let's also get some food on the way, who knows what might happen when we encounter those fuckers, maybe we'll have to chase them. Can't do that on an empty stomach!
We don't have time for that, they might not be there by then. Now let's go.
Fuck it! Fine. Let's go.
black_market,organ_trade,shady
Heard there’s a doc in Dead City selling organs off the books.
Yeah, 'doc' is a stretch. More like butcher with a scalpel. Prices high, risk higher.
People desperate enough to pay for a kidney or liver? Fucking hell.
Desperation breeds weird trades out here. Heard some of those organs end up in bio-experiments.
Best stay clear. Don’t want to end up as one of those stories.
black_market,arms_deal,conflict
You catch wind of the arms deal at the old factory last night?
Yeah. Word is some rookie tried to muscle the seller. Didn’t end well.
Let me guess, gunfire and a pile of bodies?
Exactly. The buyer took off with half the shipment, the rest burned in the fire.
Black market’s no place for amateurs.
black_market,artifact,hunting
Got a lead on a rare artifact, some glowing thing buried near Jupiter.
Jupiter? That place is a fucking death trap, why risk it?
Because it fetches top rubles on the black market. Supposedly some old Soviet tech fused with anomaly energy.
Sounds like a myth. But if true, worth more than a small army’s ammo stockpile.
I’m sending a team out next week. Interested?
Count me in. Just make sure the payout’s real this time.
black_market,organ_harvest,rumors
Heard some poor bastard got nabbed near Pripyat last week.
Nabbed? By who?
Some group deals in organs. grab, cut, sell. No questions asked.
Blyat... Makes you wonder what's worse mutants or humans.
Humans, every time. Zone’s deadly, but at least it doesn’t stab you in the back.
black_market,artifact_trade,negotiation
%other_first_name%, got my hands on a Whispering Stone. Want to see if you can move it.
Whispering Stone? Those things bring bad luck. Why risk it?
Because it’s worth a damn fortune to the right buyer. High risk, high reward.
Where’s the meet?
Sending you the details.
Got it. Hope the buyer’s as real as the risks.
lost_messages,pda,reflection
Picked up a PDA on a dead loner near Yanov. Loaded with entries.
What kind of entries? Usual zone diary or something juicy?
Mostly paranoid ramblings, notes about a “shadow watching him” and some coordinates.
Shadow watching? That’s just zone madness creeping in.
Maybe. But one entry ends with "They’re closer than I thought... can’t run anymore."
Fuck, makes you wonder what really got him.
journal,lost_messages,stalker_reflection
Found a journal on that last body we found.
Anything useful or just another goodbye note?
More than that. Talks about a hidden bunker, strange noises at night, and a betrayal.
Betrayal? Between stalkers or something worse?
Unclear. But he wrote “Trust no one, even those with your blood.”
Cold. Zone changes people, or just brings out who they really are.
radio_logs,lost_messages,mystery
Scavenged some old radio logs off a dead stalker’s PDA.
Like what? Chatter about mutants or secret labs?
More like a cryptic message repeating over and over: “The watcher sees all. The end is near.”
Sounds like zone bullshit. Or a warning from someone gone mad.
Maybe both. I’m starting to think the Zone isn’t just physical anymore.
lost_messages,coordinates,mystery
Found a PDA with coordinates scribbled all over it, none matching any known spots.
Could be secret stash locations or traps. Or someone’s madness.
One of the notes said “Meet me here if you want to live.” No name, no date.
And no one showed up, apparently.
Yeah. Just silence and a dead stalker’s last hope.
lost_messages,last_words,pda
Read the last message from a PDA found on a stalker near the power plant.
What did it say?
“If you find this, I’m gone for good. The Zone’s not forgiving, and neither are people out here.”
Harsh truth. Nobody gets out unscarred.
Yeah. Makes you wonder how many stories end like this, buried and forgotten.
lost_messages,journal,memory,paranoia
Found a journal of some poor guy losing track of time and places.
Zone’s brutal. Long days without rest mess with your head.
He wrote about forgetting where he was, who he was with—getting paranoid.
Isolation will do that. The Zone doesn’t just kill you fast, it wears you down slow.
Last note said: “If I lose myself completely, who’s left to survive?”
lost_messages,betrayal,journal
Found a PDA accusing a teammate of selling them out during a raid.
Does the PDA say who?
Only initials, but the tone’s deadly serious—threats included.
Trust is thin in the Zone, and even thinner between stalkers.
Sometimes you’re better off watching your back than your front.
lost_messages,coordinates,secret
Found coordinates scribbled on a PDA—places none of us recognize.
Could be secret stash spots or traps set by bandits.
One note says “Meet here if you want the goods.” No names, no dates.
Looks like someone vanished before the meet-up.
lost_messages,last_entry,pda
Found the last PDA entry of a stalker near the power plant.
What was it?
“If you find this, I’m dead. Zone’s taken too many. Trust no one.”
Cold words, but true out here.
lost_messages,radio,pda,unfinished
Got an unfinished radio message saved on a PDA.
What did it say?
“Can’t hold much longer. If anyone hears this, stay clear of Sector 9. Bandits moving in hard.”
Sector 9’s known for trouble. No surprise there.
smuggling,gear,risk
Heard about that run last night? Packed with medical supplies, went sideways fast.
Yeah, someone hit the convoy near the south checkpoint. Lost half the load.
That was supposed to be the big shipment, no room for mistakes.
Smuggling in the Zone ain’t a game. One slip and you’re dead or worse—no questions asked.
smuggling,brokers,information
Know anyone moving goods through the Black Road these days?
Eh I might know one guy. Quiet type. Doesn’t share details unless you bring serious cash.
That’s the way it goes. Loose lips don’t last long out here.
Word is he’s got contacts on both sides of the border, real tight operation.
Fuck yeah! hook me up, send me the details.
smuggling,people,risk
Heard they’re moving some strange people into the Zone now, all kinds of shit.
Like what?
Like tourists blyat, rich westerners who pay good money to the ukranian military for guided tours and even to kill Loners! From the cozy safety of an advantage point setup by the military.
You're crazy, that sounds fucking ridiculious.
I'm telling you, those rich fuckers ran out of thrill seeking activities, the Zone is chaotic and with no real laws. Perfect spot for exploitation and blind eyes.
I've been here awhile never heard of this. Sorry but sounds outlandish.

They dressed them up in military gear and only stay at advantage points in the outskirts of areas. Given a nice rifle with a scope and wait over busy areas. If a Loner dies no one cares. If they find mutants it's just a nice extra.
Conspiracies grow by the day. I see.
past,zone,casual
Ever think about what you did before all this?
Sometimes. Mostly when I'm drunk.
I had a normal job once. Now look at me.
Zone changes everyone.
Yeah. Into what though?
Whatever keeps us alive another day.
betrayal,revenge,conflict
Found out who left you at the warehouse.
Who?
You sure you want to know?
Tell me.
Your call what happens next.
guilt,violence,initiation
First time you shot a man? Not mutants, not bandits—a real person.
...some patrol guy. He was checking IDs at a bridge. I had contraband. Long time ago.
Still see his face?
Every damn night. His helmet visor was cracked. Saw his eyes widen.
Welcome to the Zone. Where we trade pieces of our soul for one more day.
madness,psychosis,paranoia
You hear it too, don’t you? That... humming. Like a broken radio.
It’s not real. Your brain’s cooking from the anomalies.
It’s real. It calls to me. Says things—my name, places, dates...
Get to the Ecologists. Now. Before you end up like the Monolith.
...What if they’re right? What if it *is* speaking?
loss,grief,brotherhood
Buried another one today. Stalker named Vikhr. Good man.
How’d it happen?
Electro anomaly near Jupiter. Mistook it for an artifact glow.
He deserved better than a shallow grave and a rusted tag.
We all do. But the Zone doesn’t give what we deserve.
morality,sacrifice,hard_choices
Found a kid yesterday, maybe 18/19, trying to loot a military patrol. Stupid.
You stop him?
No. Let him go. Figured the bullets would teach him better than I could.
Christ. That’s cold.
No. Cold would’ve been putting him down myself to spare the suffering.
fatalism,last_rites,acceptance
You're coughing blood again.
Ecologists confirmed it this morning. The Zone's finally claiming me.
Cyka...How long?
Long enough to settle accounts. Short enough that it hurts to breathe.
Name what you need.
Just keep the vodka coming. And don't let them bury me in some unmarked ditch.
cnpp,dangerous,leaving
Going to the reactor tomorrow.
That's suicide. Why?
Best artifacts are there. One good haul and I'm out.
Nobody comes back from there.
Then I'll be the first. Or I won't.
Dead Man walking.
mutants,loss,adaptation
Saw a pack of pseudodogs take down 2 stalkers near the swamps yesterday.
New to the Zone? Mutants learn faster than we do.
They flanked them... like fucking tacticians.
Stop seeing animals. See predators. Or you'll feed them too.
radiation,sickness,denial
%other_last_name% when did you last check your dosimeter?
Battery died weeks ago. What's the point?
The point is knowing whether to dig your grave now or later.
We're all dying. Just some faster than others.
Then at least die useful. Hand me that detector before you collapse.
artifacts,deception,desperation
Heard about that "golden ball" artifact near the cement factory?
Another fairy tale for rookies.
A team went looking last week. None came back.
The Zone doesn't make miracles. It makes corpses.
Then why do we keep believing?
Because the alternative is admitting this is all for nothing.
debt,consequences,hard_lessons
%other_last_name%, Markov's looking for you. Says you owe him two artifact shares.
Tell him I'll pay after my next run.
You've ran out of "runs". Wants payment now... or your fingers.
Fucking vulture. Tell him he'll get paid when I drag something valuable out of a corpse.
Make it soon. His collectors shoot first these days.
remembrance,loss,tradition
Why do you leave those bullet casings on the roadside crosses?
So the dead know we haven't forgotten. So we remember it could be us next.
They're just rotting wood and rusted metal.
Everything rots here. Still matters to leave a mark.
...Got a spare casing?
artifacts,scam,anger
%speaker1_first_name% here. That "Firefly" you sold me is fake as fuck!
What? No way, I tested it myself before selling.
It's a fucking glowing rock with radiation! You trying to kill me?
Look, maybe it degraded. Artifacts do that sometimes...
Bullshit! I want my 30k back or we're gonna have problems.
All sales are final, you know the rules.
Then I'll take it out of your skinny ass next time I see you.
competition,territory,tension
Hey %other_first_name%, heard you were working my sector. Not cool.
Your sector? Since when do you own the Zone?
Since I've been working it for three months. Find your own hunting grounds.
Fuck off. First come, first served. Zone doesn't belong to anyone.
Keep pushing and see what happens.
monolith,danger,warning
URGENT: Monolith patrol spotted heading out %location%!
How many? Armed with what?
At least 4, maybe more. Exoskeletons and heavy weapons.
Cyka. That's a heavy scout squad. Stay on high alert.
They're chanting something... gives me the fucking creeps.
Don't listen to it, Just get the fuck out of there!
mutants,hunting,warning
Just saw the biggest fucking pseudodog I've ever seen.
How big we talking?
Size of a small car. Pure white. Leading a pack of at least 20.
That's the albino alpha everyone's been talking about. Worth 50k dead.
Yeah? Well whoever wants that bounty can have it. Thing looked smart.
Smart how?
It saw me scoping it and backed the whole pack into cover. Like it knew what a rifle was.
faction,betrayal,politics
Word is %other_faction% pricks are planning something big against us.
Let them try. We've held this territory for years.
No, I mean BIG. Someone saw them moving heavy ordinance.
Where'd you hear this?
Trader at the bar. Said one of their guys got drunk and talked too much.
Could be disinformation. But we should prepare anyway.
Already started. Got the boys checking all defensive positions.
Good. If they want a war, we'll give them one.
artifacts,scam,anger
%speaker1_first_name% here. That "Firefly" you sold me is fake as fuck!
What? No way, I tested it myself before selling.
It's a fucking glowing rock with radiation! You trying to kill me?
Look, maybe it degraded. Artifacts do that sometimes...
Bullshit! I want my 30k back or we're gonna have problems.
All sales are final, you know the rules.
Then I'll take it out of your hide next time I see you.
competition,territory,tension
Hey %other_first_name%, heard you were working my sector. Not cool.
Your sector? Since when do you own the Zone?
Since I've been working it for three months. Find your own hunting grounds.
Fuck off. First come, first served. Zone doesn't belong to anyone.
Keep pushing and see what happens.
monolith,danger,warning
URGENT: Monolith patrol spotted moving towards %location%!
How many? Armed with what?
At least 8, maybe more. Exoskeletons and heavy weapons.
Shit. That's a death squad. Everyone needs to clear out NOW.
They're chanting something... gives me the fucking creeps.
Don't listen to it! Just get the fuck out of there!
mutants,hunting,warning
Just saw the biggest fucking pseudodog I've ever seen.
How big we talking?
Size of a small car. Pure white. Leading a pack of at least 20.
That's the albino alpha everyone's been talking about. Worth 100k dead.
Yeah? Well whoever wants that bounty can have it. Thing looked smart.
Smart how?
It saw me scoping it and backed the whole pack into cover. Like it knew what a rifle was.
faction,betrayal,politics
Word is %other_faction% is planning something big against us.
Let them try. We've held this territory for years.
No, I mean BIG. Someone saw them moving heavy ordinance.
Where'd you hear this?
Trader at the bar. Said one of their guys got drunk and talked too much.
Could be disinformation. But we should prepare anyway.
Already started. Got the boys checking all defensive positions.
Good. If they want a war, we'll give them one.
artifacts,dangerous,experiment
%other_first_name%, ever tried "cooking" artifacts?
Cooking? What the fuck does that mean?
Exposing them to specific anomalies to change their properties.
Sounds like a good way to blow yourself up.
Maybe. But I turned a cheap Stone Blood into something worth triple.
How?
Electro anomaly, 30 seconds. Changes the radiation signature completely.
And if it goes wrong?
Then you're picking pieces of yourself off the ceiling.
medical,emergency,radiation
Need anti-rad NOW! %speaker1_first_name%, I'm burning up!
Where are you? What happened?
Fell into a rad pocket near the old trucks. Geiger's screaming!
Get to the medic at %location%! I'll radio ahead!
Can't... see straight. Everything's spinning.
MOVE YOUR ASS! You stop moving, you're dead!
anomaly,research,discovery
Those eggheads at the mobile lab made a breakthrough.
About what? More useless theories?
No, they figured out how to predict anomaly movements.
Bullshit. Anomalies don't move in patterns.
That's what we thought. But apparently they follow some kind of cycle.
Even if true, how does that help us?
Safe paths. Know when and where to move. Could save lives.
philosophy,zone,drunk
You know what? The Zone is like a woman.
Oh fuck, here we go. How much vodka you had?
No, listen! She's beautiful, dangerous, and full of secrets.
And she'll kill you if you don't respect her.
EXACTLY! This guy gets it!
Pass the bottle. If we're doing philosophy, I need to be drunk too.
veteran,stories,advice
%other_first_name%, how long you been in the Zone?
Coming up on seven years. You?
Just hit my second month. Any advice for surviving?
Yeah. Trust your gut, not your eyes. Zone likes to play tricks.
What kind of tricks?
Phantom sounds, fake artifacts, paths that change. Stay paranoid.
Fucking hell...yeah i guess i wasn't paranoid enough
And never, EVER, follow The Lights at night. No matter how friendly they look.
Why? What are they?
Nobody who followed them ever came back to tell.
hunting,chimera,teamwork
That Chimera is still terrorizing the northern checkpoint.
How many has it killed now?
Four stalkers in two weeks. Tears through armor like paper.
We need a proper hunting party. No solo hero bullshit.
I'm in. But we need at least five guys.
And someone who actually knows how to track the bastard.
trader,mystery,suspicious
New trader showed up at %location%. Something's off about him.
Off how? Bad prices? Fake goods?
No, opposite. Prices too good. Military-grade stuff dirt cheap.
Sounds like a setup. Nobody sells that low without a reason.
That's what I thought. Plus he's asking weird questions about specific stalkers.
Stay clear. Might be military intelligence or worse.
Already warned the others. But some idiots are still buying.
corruption,body_horror,warning
Don't go near the flesh anomaly at the pig farm.
Why? Just another gross Zone thing?
No. Saw a stalker touch it. His arm... it started growing things.
Growing things? What kind of things?
Eyes. Teeth. Fingers that weren't his. Had to cut the whole arm off.
Jesus fucking Christ...
Zone's getting more creative with how it kills us.
sniper,danger,warning
SOLO SNIPER active at the bridge! Stay the fuck down!
Where's he positioned? Anyone get eyes on him?
Water tower, north side. Already dropped two of ours.
Military? Merc? Who?
Can't tell. But he's good. Real good.
memory,psychological,zone_effect
Anyone else having trouble remembering things lately?
What kind of things?
Like... why I came to the Zone. Can't remember anymore.
That's the Zone working on you. Happens to most eventually.
But I had a reason. I KNOW I had a reason. It was important.
Whatever it was, it doesn't matter now. Only thing that matters is surviving today.
trading,conflict,violence
%other_first_name% That trade at midnight? It's a setup. Don't go.
How do you know?
Overheard them planning. They want your artifacts AND your head.
Those fucks... I knew something was off.
Want to turn the tables? I know where they're setting up.
I'm listening. Swap channels.
warning,danger,faction
%other_first_name%, this is your last warning. Come out the building or die.
You're gonna fucking shoot me if I come out.
We have you surrounded. Ten guns on your position.
I count six and I'm fully prepared to go down, fuck off or try to rush me .
Last chance. Walk out.
You know what?!
CYKA BLYAT! GRENADE.
Still "ten" fucks out there?!
ENGAGE! GO! GO!.
dreams,zone,psychological
The dreams are getting worse.
What dreams? The Zone dreams?
Yeah. Keep seeing a room full of bodies. But they're all me.
Shit. That's heavy. How long this been going on?
Week now. And each night there's one more body.
Maybe stay away from the psy-fields for a while.
I haven't been near any. That's what scares me.
controller,aftermath,psychological
%speaker1_first_name%, I made it out. Controller's dead.
Holy shit, you actually killed it? How?
Grenades. Lots of them. But... something's wrong with me now.
Wrong how?
I can hear everyone's thoughts. Not words, just... feelings. It's loud.
Cyka. Controller must have done something to your brain.
I need to get away from people. It's too much. Going dark for a while.
mystery,radio,signal
Anyone else picking up that weird signal on channel 14.5?
The numbers station? Yeah, creepy as fuck.
No, this is different. It's... music? But wrong somehow.
Don't listen to it. Remember what happened to Pavel.
What happened to Pavel?
Listened to a weird signal for an hour. Next day he walked into an anomaly. Smiling.
...Switching channels now.
horror,zone,nightmare
I can't unsee what I found in that basement.
Do I even want to know?
Human spider. I mean it. Human torso, spider legs. Still alive.
What the fuck... Zone mutation?
No. Surgical scars. Someone MADE it. It begged me to kill it.
Jesus Christ. Did you?
FUCK NO! I ran the fuck out of there! Leave it for someone else to deal with. EUGH.
